**Hi There!** Thanks for stopping by my little corner of the internet! My name is Joschka Schwarz and I am excited to meet you. Below you will find my current CV.

![](img/under_cons.png){fig-alt="website under constuction" fig-align="center"}

::: {#hero-heading}
5 years' experience working with data. Expertise in quantitative modeling, growing people and making data-driven decisions. Currently working as a Research Associate (Ph.D. Candidate) at the intersection of computer science, statistics and the social sciences as member of both the Entrepreneurship & Data Science groups.
:::
